Empowering Afghan Women Through Education

Providing online courses, learning materials, and support for Afghan women to achieve their dreams.

Start Learning

Who We Are

AFGWomen is a nonprofit initiative dedicated to giving Afghan women access to free online education and resources. We believe that knowledge is power, and every woman deserves the opportunity to learn, grow, and lead. Our mission is to break barriers, provide high-quality educational content, and create a supportive community where Afghan women can thrive.

What We Offer

Free Online Courses

Access to a variety of courses in language, business, technology, and life skills.

Digital Learning Materials

Free PDFs, videos, and tutorials to enhance your learning experience.

Mentorship Programs

Connect with experienced mentors who guide you in your education journey.

Community Support

Join a safe and inspiring network of Afghan women learners.

Workshops & Webinars

Participate in live online sessions to build skills and confidence.
